original_text: “They will die of deadly diseases. They will not be mourned or buried but will be like dung lying on the ground. They will perish by sword and famine, and their dead bodies will become food for the birds and the wild animals.”
korean_text: 그들은 독한 병으로 죽어도 아무도 슬퍼하지 않을 것이며 묻어 주지 않아 지면의 분토와 같을 것이며 칼과 기근에 망하고 그 시체는 공중의 새와 땅의 짐승의 밥이 되리라

sentences.original_text: They will die of deadly diseases.
They will not be mourned or buried
but will be like dung lying on the ground.
They will perish by sword and famine,
and their dead bodies will become food for the birds
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 시체는 새들의 먹이가 될 것이고
